thag5.7:1.3_0: I plunged into the water at Gayā
thag5.7:2.2_0: having previously left to join the past,
thag5.7:2.3_0: I’ll now wash away right here”—
thag5.7:2.4_0: such was the view I used to hold.
thag5.7:4.1_0: I’ve washed away all bad things;
thag5.7:4.3_0: the pure heir of the pure one,
thag5.7:4.4_0: a true-born child of the Buddha.
thag5.7:5.1_0: When I plunged into the eightfold stream,
thag5.7:5.2_0: all bad things were washed away.
